data.text: @awyllie13 @SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi Interesting. I’m using RATs from the UK and they rely upon swabbing tonsils first followed by nasal passage
@SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi My nose only goes straight up not inwards I don’t get it

@SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi So with RAT testing often negative for infected people and clearly a 'let it rip' strategy now in place could this be why daily cases are the highest per capita globally 🤔
@SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi Saggital view of Chris Luxon attempting to brush his teeth @SiouxsieW

@DrEricLevi @SiouxsieW I found your video so so so helpful when I did my RAT, Eric, so thank you to you for putting ikt together and thank you for sharing it, Siouxsie so I had the opportunity to see it!

@SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi Why don't you make a video how it's done properly? Maybe use a hammer to get it in deep enough. I'll bet you're related to Joseph Mengele!! I hope when all this bs is over you also will be held accountable. And do something about that hair, how old are you? 12?
@SiouxsieW @tinangata @XTOTL @DrEricLevi I didn’t even know my nose had this many holes!
@awyllie13 @SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi Unfortunately that isn't being recommended here, I have friends, who very likely have Covid but they are testing negative and just carrying on.

@SiouxsieW Thank you ❤️ He's agreed he needs to stay away for a few extra days so fingers crossed that's enough to keep covid away from my fucked up immune system! Thank you so much for all the work you do to keep us all informed, you really are incredible 😊

@SiouxsieW @XTOTL @DrEricLevi Planting the image of keeping the test parallel to tongue while slowly moving it back could help with orientation for people who may be confused. Nasal Humming, also helps as it distracts the brain and seems to reduce anxiety (no hard evidence but leant from an ent)
